title: Homeland Security Secretary Defends Executive Actions On Immigration
teaser: Audie Cornish talks to Jeh Johnson, secretary of the Department of Homeland Security.
contentencoded:
Audie Cornish talks to Jeh Johnson, secretary of the Department of Homeland Security (DHS), about what the effects would be on DHS if Congress did not vote to fund it.
